ai-mil3.1.13:1.3_0: “Great king, this is characterized by the marks of mindfulness, and if it is possible,”
ai-mil3.1.13:1.5_0: “Great king, arises in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. These four kinds of mindfulness meditation are skillful, blameworthy, not today, and the four right efforts. These four bases of psychic power, the five faculties are the five powers. These are the seven awakening factors.
ai-mil3.1.13:1.6_0: That which brings resort and cultivates two things, and doesn’t cultivate things.
ai-mil3.1.13:1.7_0: he enjoys what is pride and threats, and he does not fear what he says.
ai-mil3.1.13:2.2_0: “As a wheel-turning monarch’s chief queen, the chariot-maker, the king’s calling him a chariot-maker, or waste-collector. And so much gold, drink, water, and reply.
ai-mil3.1.13:2.3_0: In the same way, when there is skillful qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
ai-mil3.1.13:2.4_0: That which brings resort and cultivates two things, and doesn’t cultivate things.
ai-mil3.1.13:2.5_0: he enjoys what is pride and threats, and he does not fear what he says.
ai-mil3.1.13:3.2_0: “Great king, these things are found in the things that are phenomena, when these things are found, they are not criticized.
ai-mil3.1.13:3.3_0: These things are helpful, then these things are helpful.’
ai-mil3.1.13:3.4_0: By this he conceives those who practises in the teaching, ~ and those who live in conformity with the Dhamma.
ai-mil3.1.13:3.5_0: Without although he goes the Dhamma, he prevents those who settles irrevers.
ai-mil3.1.13:4.2_0: “As a wheel-turning monarch’s chief queen, the wheel-turning monarch knows, and the king is present,
ai-mil3.1.13:4.3_0: These are the reasons and not help them.’
ai-mil3.1.13:4.4_0: By this he makes the effort, (thinking):
ai-mil3.1.13:4.5_0: Without although non-staple food is prepared,
ai-mil3.1.13:4.6_0: In the same way, these things are found, and these things are found in them.
ai-mil3.1.13:4.7_0: These things are helpful, then these things are helpful.’
ai-mil3.1.13:4.8_0: By this he conceives those who practises in the teaching, ~ and those who live in conformity with the Dhamma.
ai-mil3.1.13:4.9_0: Without enquiring the Dhamma, they use the donor who attend on him.
ai-mil3.1.13:4.10_0: That’s how mindfulness has the characteristic of light.
ai-mil3.1.13:6.1_0: Mindfulness has the characteristics of fullness.
